abilities.name: Tough Hide
abilities.details: Baal stores a portion of damage taken and heals back a percentage of it when out of combat.

abilities.name: Oxen Force
abilities.details: Baal's next three basic attacks release a shockwave in a small cone-shaped area, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Wild Trample
abilities.details: Baal slams down his foot to the ground, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to all nearby enemies and slowing them for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Bull Rush
abilities.details:
Baal charges forward, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to all enemies hit.

If Baal hits an enemy hero, Bull Rush will stop and fling the target backward.

If Baal hits small monsters and minions, Bull Rush will knock them aside instead.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.details:
Baal becomes unstoppable for a few seconds, reducing all incoming damage by a percentage and becoming immune to all crowd controls.

Using Unstoppable Force will also break out from any form of crowd control he is currently in.
